message.body: Tsild! Hope i caught you before your birthday is over. Happy 25th! Love, Mom
Never thought of it that way...
Thank you!! I'm officially no longer in my early twenties, yipes!
And did you get a snow day?
I did! Though there really wasn't much snow...
So i heard. It was on the news that half of dc was shut down even though the storm was lame.
Yeah..dc really just can't handle precipitation...totally lame, though it worked out in my favor!
